pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Preferred solution is worked out. Decision on deployment of external parties. A project decision follows at the end of this phase.
  • More info under description. Quarterly indication when a decision is expected.

• The problem analysed. Possible solutions are considered. Consideration of whether to solve this yourself or by external parties.
  • Fill in contact person and task to explore whether it is interesting to elaborate this in a collaborative form. Checkbox field? Yes, then task to contact.

• A problem or bottleneck has been initiated, requiring a solution.
  • Minimum fields > source required. optional account and contacts.
